Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.network.rmi

Class RMIClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.network.rmi.RMIClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClientInterface, Serializable
public class RMIClient extends Object implements ClientInterface
RMI client class that implements the ClientInterface. This class handles client-side operations for creating, joining, and managing games via RMI.
See Also:
